# Test Skill

This is a valid test skill used for testing the publish command.

## When to Use This Skill

Use this skill when testing the publish command workflow.

## How to Use This Skill

This is a test fixture - not meant for actual use.

## Best Practices

- Always validate your manifests before publishing
- Use semantic versioning
- Include clear descriptions
